channel.title: Conclusion on AWS Container DevSecOps

item.title: Survey
item.description: For a chance to win a copy of “Networking and Kubernetes: A Layered Approach” and to help improve this workshop please fill out this survey or Link https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeXNwl5M3enXJBAG988mNVFqyslzYqDgbKDgoDzOsJaR4hbLw/viewform

item.title: Cleanup
item.description: AWS Code resources Delete the Codebuild, Code commit and pipeline make tf_destroy Cluster Delete the EKS Cluster make clean_cluster Make sure to delete any other resources created Load Balancers Verify there are no Load balancers running, ALB or otherwise aws elbv2 describe-load-balancers --query "LoadBalancers[].LoadBalancerArn" aws elb describe-load-balancers --query "LoadBalancerDescriptions[].DNSName" PVC and EBS volumes Verify there are no left over EBS volumes from the PVC’s for test application aws ec2 describe-volumes --filters Name=tag:kubernetes.
